name: Bernardino
description:
Bernardino is a third-person physics-based adventure game full of challenging obstacles and giant monsters. 

Using your elastic powers, venture through its dangerous world to save your village’s ancient wizard, you are the chosen one after all!

Controls:

  • Move - WASD
  • Jump - Space
  • Grab with Left Hand - Hold LMB
  • Grab with Right Hand - Hold RMB
  • Slingshot - With both hands grabbed, pull back. Then hold space and release both hands at the right time.
  • Rotate Camera - Middle Mouse Button
  • Zoom - Scroll Wheel
